meanings.definition: Convenient or easily accessible for use.
meanings.sent1: The handiest tool in the shed is the hammer.
meanings.sent2: Having a flashlight during a blackout is the handiest thing.
meanings.sent3: She always keeps the handiest snacks in her bag for emergencies.
meanings.sent4: His quick thinking was the handiest skill he possessed during the crisis.
meanings.sent5: The handiest shortcut to the park saved us a lot of time.

meanings.definition: Skilled with the hands; adept at manual tasks.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa is the handiest person I know when it comes to fixing things.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter's handiest employee was always in demand.
meanings.sent3: The handiest magician in town could make anything disappear.
meanings.sent4: Her handiest trick was being able to juggle multiple tasks effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The handiest craftsman in the village could create wonders from wood.
